content: Below, you can find a list of all the Curios in the game, along with their locations. You can also click the links to find detailed breakdowns of each Curios item's location. In addition to our walkthrough, you can check each Curios accessory off below as you find them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Curios.md', within the main section titled 'Curios', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Curios Locations'.
The content is as follows:
Below, you can find a list of all the Curios in the game, along with their locations. You can also click the links to find detailed breakdowns of each Curios item's location. In addition to our walkthrough, you can check each Curios accessory off below as you find them.
